title: Why George Soros Was Targeted
description:
Along with Barack Obama, Hillary Clinton and CNN, George Soros was one of those recently targeted with a series of bombs. David Meyers speaks with Bloomberg's Katherine Burton on why the liberal billionaire philanthropist was among them. 
FOLLOW UP
 Katherine's latest report: After Bomb Scare, Soros Foundation Decries ‘Politics of Hate’
You can follow Katherine at: @Burtonkathy
----
 TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
